text: Rosamund Pike (born 27 January 1979) is an English actress. She became known in the 2002 movie Die Another Day in which she played the Bond girl and double agent Miranda Frost. She also played Helen in the 2012 melodrama movie Jack Reacher. Her role in Gone Girl got her an Academy Award nomination. Pike was born in London. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from London Category:Actors who played Bond villains Category:Actresses who played Bond girls Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:English television actors
title: Rosamund Pike
